duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and providing friendly, knowledgeable, and courteous service to each guest entering the store.
Training new cashiers and cross-training other associates while driving loyalty results.
Completing register open and close functions, informing guests of current promotions, and booking appointments for in-store events.
Ensuring store cleanliness, replenishing products, setting up advertising displays, and participating in physical inventory preparation.
Handling sales, refunds, and exchanges, and staying informed regarding new products to better serve guests.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma (or equivalent) with 2+ years of relevant work experience
